title: The world's biggest fast-food chain just landed in NYC. We tried Mixue — and the hype is real.
full_text: The world's biggest fast-food chain just landed in NYC. We tried Mixue — and the hype is real.. From $1.19 ice cream cones to $2.48 oolong tea, Mixue's menu options are wildly affordable — giving McDonald's a run for its money.. I visited the Mixue location in Midtown Manhattan's Herald Square.Henry Chandonnet/Business Insider <ul><li>Mixue has opened its first American locations: two in New York, and one in Los Angeles.</l… [+6898 chars]
